Tairāwhiti health care: Low immunisation, but faster cancer care and ED waits https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/tairawhiti-health-care-low-immunisation-but-faster-cancer-care-and-ed-waits/RT2RNUUMAVAADMKDYUMF4CFE4A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/tairawhiti-health-care-low-immunisation-but-faster-cancer-care-and-ed-waits/RT2RNUUMAVAADMKDYUMF4CFE4A/ Wynsley WrigleyTairawhiti achieved the highest ED efficiency, with 92.2% treated in six hours. Mon, 10 Mar 2025 23:16:37 +0000 Gisborne Hospital staff have achieved three of five Health Targets set by the Government for the quarter ended September 2024. Health NZ-Tairawhiti director of operations John Swiatczak (inset) said recruiting senior doctors was an ongoing priority.
